context: WEX (rebranded from Wright Express in 2012) expanding beyond fuel cards into broader payment solutions. Intense competition with FleetCor in Europe, particularly after FleetCor's Comdata acquisition strengthened domestic rivalry. Both companies pursued aggressive fleet provider deals globally, with Europe becoming competitive hotbed.
